data.title: Foundation Nightclub
data.meta_description: Contact Foundation Nightclub in Seattle, with weddings starting at $8,384 for 50 guests. Customize your own price, browse photos and special offers.
data.text: Transcending traditional boundaries, Foundation Nightclub commands full sensory attention. Sophisticated, innovative and authentic, this venue is perfect for those looking to provide their guests with an experience they will never forget. Foundation is an intimate venue that functions not only as a nightclub, but also as an event space for your perfect wedding celebration. With 3 VIP areas, 3 bars and over 10,000 square feet, it is clear to see luxury is the order of business. Inspired with a take on post-modern minimalist art deco, the modular stage, hand blown glass details and laser cut LED wall lavishly dress up the venue. Ranked among the Top 100 Clubs worldwide, Foundation is Seattle’s ultimate wedding event venue. After you tie the knot, join your family and friends at this gorgeous venue for a celebration you’ll be talking about for years to come. Experience a fantastic wedding day at Foundation Nightclub.
